TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ServiceRuntime extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The static class that provides methods to register reliable services with Service Fabric runtime.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task RegisterServiceAsync (string serviceTypeName, Func<System.Fabric.StatefulServiceContext,Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Runtime.StatefulServiceBase> serviceFactory, TimeSpan timeout = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task RegisterServiceAsync(string serviceTypeName, class System.Func`2<class System.Fabric.StatefulServiceContext, class Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Runtime.StatefulServiceBase> serviceFactory, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The service type name as provied in service manifest.
A factory method to create stateful service objects.
The timeout for the register operation.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
Docs.summary: Registers a reliable stateful service with Service Fabric runtime.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous register operation.
Docs.para: Default timeout for this operation is taken from ServiceFactoryRegistrationTimeout in Hosting section of the cluster manifest. Default value for ServiceFactoryRegistrationTimeout is 120 seconds.
The default timeout for this operation is taken from ServiceFactoryRegistrationTimeout in Hosting section of the cluster manifest. Default value for ServiceFactoryRegistrationTimeout is 120 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task RegisterServiceAsync (string serviceTypeName, Func<System.Fabric.StatelessServiceContext,Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Runtime.StatelessService> serviceFactory, TimeSpan timeout = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

Docs.param: The service type name as provied in service manifest.

The timeout for the register operation.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
Docs.summary: Registers a reliable stateless service with Service Fabric runtime.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous register operation.
Docs.para: Default timeout for this operation is taken from ServiceFactoryRegistrationTimeout in Hosting section of the cluster manifest. Default value for ServiceFactoryRegistrationTimeout is 120 seconds.
